items.rawContent:
{
    "displayName": "$$CD6273FD0A71E547C46AFA4232B1079E96FB",
    "id": "gs.ChangeStringVariables",
    "group": "$$2DCE5AEAK657FA4F5BS8EC3EA543DC123D24",
    "subGroup": "$$P235",
    "order": 2,
    "expanded": true,
    "defaultValue": { "source": 0, "target": 0, "sourceVariable": GS.CONST.DEFAULT_VARIABLE_DATA, "targetReferenceDomain": GS.CONST.DEFAULT_DOMAIN, "targetReference": GS.CONST.DEFAULT_VARIABLE_DATA, "targetVariable": GS.CONST.DEFAULT_VARIABLE_DATA, "targetRangeScope": 0, "rangeStart": 0, "rangeEnd": 0, "operation": 0, "valueType": 0, "textValue": "" },
    "quickItems": [
        {
            "label": "$$30A49AB7K99E9A4E59SAA85EAA161A0E1836",
            "valueFormula": "return GS.CONST.TEXT_VARIABLE_TARGETS[p.target]",
            "attribute": "target",
            "identifier": "target",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dataSource": GS.CONST.TEXT_VARIABLE_TARGETS,
            "showItems": [["targetVariable"], ["targetRangeScope", "rangeStart", "rangeEnd"], ["targetRangeScope", "targetReference"]]
        },
        {
            "label": "$$CEA96B0BK6FBBA416BSB00FEDF96A1248489",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtStrVar(p.targetVariable)",
            "attribute": "targetVariable",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dialog": { "uid": "dialog.selectVariable", "parameters": { "dataSource": "strings" }}
        },
        {
            "label": "$$8F52A5EE89E7E948CD5805E9FD34F6392535",
            "valueFormula": "return GS.CONST.VARIABLE_SCOPES[p.targetRangeScope]",
            "attribute": "targetRangeScope",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dataSource": GS.CONST.VARIABLE_SCOPES
        },
        {
            "label": "$$CA1904C34CB8A64AEE891DD1784948E737C4",
            "valueFormula": "return p.rangeStart;",
            "type": "GSQStepper",
            "attribute": "rangeStart",
            "minimum": 1,
            "maximum": GS.CONST.MAX_NUMBER_VALUE
        },
        {
            "label": "$$DC1A41265CECC346098B4931B5874A2AF62A",
            "valueFormula": "return p.rangeEnd;",
            "type": "GSQStepper",
            "attribute": "rangeEnd",
            "minimum": 1,
            "maximum": GS.CONST.MAX_NUMBER_VALUE
        },
        {
            "label": "$$E9D43A91K0788A42D6SB1BEECB5798FF9691",
            "identifier": "targetReference",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtNumVar(p.targetReference)",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dialog": { "uid": "dialog.selectVariable", "parameters": { "dataSource": "numbers" } },
            "attribute": "targetReference",
            "domainButton": true
        },
        {
            "label": "$$2900A383K89C0A4833SB25FE5DE87EB43DD7",
            "valueFormula": "return GS.CONST.TEXT_VARIABLE_OPERATIONS[p.operation]",
            "attribute": "operation",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dataSource": GS.CONST.TEXT_VARIABLE_OPERATIONS
        },
        {
            "label": "$$78F4DB01K876EA43F7S97A0EC7758C04B58A",
            "valueFormula": "return GS.CONST.TEXT_VARIABLE_SOURCES[p.source]",
            "attribute": "source",
            "identifier": "source",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dataSource": GS.CONST.TEXT_VARIABLE_SOURCES,
            "showItems": [["text"], ["sourceVariable"]]
        },
        {
            "label": "",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtStrVar(p.sourceVariable)",
            "attribute": "sourceVariable",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dialog": { "uid": "dialog.selectVariable", "parameters": { "dataSource": "strings" }}
        }
    ],
    "fullSizeItems": [
        {
            "identifier": "text",
            "valueFormula": "return lcsg(p.textValue) || lcs('01287A7825B6604DB689B762A33E73E024D4')",
            "variableButton": { "dataSource": "strings" },
            "attribute": "textValue",
            "type": "GSQTextArea",
            "localizable": true
        }
    ]
}
items.name: Text Variable
